General.Name: Anghami De Inc
General.Description: Anghami Inc. operates a digital music entertainment technology platform in the Middle East and North Africa. It offers digital entertainment and online streaming services, including music, podcasts, music videos, and live events; and a music application and platform that provides Arabic and international music to stream and download. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Abu Dhabi, the United Arab Emirates.
General.Address: Al-Khatem Tower, WeWork Hub 71, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates
